text: “Kha Mosesra, mbe Isreriŋ fhum khaŋ ana suaŋgi, ‘The nza ganɨ zav ndu ndim guman panan fagim, ndu nza ganɨ za mbui?’ Mbe maaŋ suaŋgi guma Mosesra, Fhe Bakɨme ntigem wom ana sarigi. Ana ntigem taagi ŋgɨp mba Isrerin guman pan kɨv, taagip mbe Idzɨviŋ tɨn mbe ndigirga. Moses ntigem mba kha bisaneŋ shim, ana ne ganɨ zav vuim, Fhe Bakɨme won enser ga sarigim, ana zav, mba vhava vhen hɨgap ŋkasŋkar Moses ga nɨɨŋgi.
